archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0010
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a marketer, I want to be able to upsell customers during their purchase journey based on their current products in cart or behaviour, so that I can sell them more products with Vodafone.

properties.value: This one is about a recommendation mechanism (basket analysis). This is currently not part of Comarch solution (but is there in the product roadmap). To be discussed during the architecture session where this solution could be placed (externally of Comarch?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
